meanings.definition: The person who has been murdered.
meanings.sent1: The murderees were innocent victims of the crime.
meanings.sent2: The police were investigating the identities of the murderees found in the abandoned warehouse.
meanings.sent3: The murderees in the mystery novel turned out to be alive and well in the final chapter.
meanings.sent4: The memories of the murderees haunted the small town for years to come.
meanings.sent5: The murderees' families gathered to mourn their loss at the candlelight vigil.

meanings.sent1: The murderees were caught by the authorities after a long chase.
meanings.sent2: The trial focused on the actions of the murderees and their motives.
meanings.sent3: The murderees in the movie turned out to be the heroes in disguise.
meanings.sent4: The group of murderees stood in silence as the judge read out the verdict.
meanings.sent5: The murderees' hideout was discovered by the clever detective.
